Text: one request...IDK whether u take requests or not...but i saw you uploading great classics(romancing the stone,war of the roses) of kathleen turner....i am a great fan of her....just wanna ask one thing do you have any plan of uploading her greatest film "BODY HEAT".....its a great movie....and i can't find a good copy of this..the BLU-RAY is out BTW......it will be great if you do it....please let me know...
already got your HDTV rip of this but i will replace it with this one..thanks..!!!
